api_list.api_description: Predicts the gender of a single name, optionally scoped to a specific country.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name to predict gender for.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Country code for localization following ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

api_list.api_description: Get WHOIS data for a given domain name.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain name for the WHOIS lookup.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Response format, valid values: json | xml.

query: Could you predict the gender of the name 'Alex' in the United States? Also, I need to find the WHOIS information for the domain 'example.com'.
